messages.subject: Re: Biographical Dictionaries

Nice! A book I can actually afford. My amazon.co.jp "wish list" is
getting longer every day...

messages.subject: Re: Biographical Dictionaries
messages.msgSnippet: ... They are somewhat ... What s wrong with them? Just curious, because at the moment I can t drop $200 on those dictionaries (although I d like to).
messages.messageBody:
--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Seven" <nlf7@...> wrote:
>
> Yes, I've got a few Biographical Dictionaries for the Shinsengumi.
They are somewhat
> helpful but to tell you the truth, I generally don't recommend them.
>
> ~Seven
>

What's wrong with them? Just curious, because at the moment I can't
drop $200 on those dictionaries (although I'd like to).

messages.subject: Re: Biographical Dictionaries
messages.msgSnippet: Yes, I ve got a few Biographical Dictionaries for the Shinsengumi.  They are somewhat helpful but to tell you the truth, I generally don t recommend them.
messages.messageBody:
Yes, I've got a few Biographical Dictionaries for the Shinsengumi. They are somewhat
helpful but to tell you the truth, I generally don't recommend them.

~Seven

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Kitsuno" <samurai-listowner@...> wrote:
>
> I've always been a huge fan of biographical dictionaries - Is there a
> cheaper version of the Shinsengumi Dai Jinmei Jiten? The Muromachi and
> Sengoku Dai Jitens also have a compact cheaper version, I'm hoping
> someone here might know of something similar for the Shinsengumi. I
> hope my constant questions aren't too obnoxious.
>
> Thanks!
>

messages.subject: RE: [SHQ] Biographical Dictionaries
messages.msgSnippet: Not sure. The full-blown serious work Meiji Ishin Jinmei Jiten has just about everyone you could think of from the Bakumatsu and then some, including
messages.messageBody:
Not sure. The full-blown serious work "Meiji Ishin Jinmei Jiten" has just
about everyone you could think of from the Bakumatsu and then some,
including Shinsengumi, but as far as a more compact version of what you've
just referenced I'm not sure. There are some websites that have archived
what seem to be full rosters and a great deal of bios, but as I have not had
the chance to look through all of them end to end I can not say if they are
thorough.

-M.

messages.subject: Biographical Dictionaries
messages.msgSnippet: I ve always been a huge fan of biographical dictionaries - Is there a cheaper version of the Shinsengumi Dai Jinmei Jiten? The Muromachi and Sengoku Dai Jitens
messages.messageBody:
I've always been a huge fan of biographical dictionaries - Is there a
cheaper version of the Shinsengumi Dai Jinmei Jiten? The Muromachi and
Sengoku Dai Jitens also have a compact cheaper version, I'm hoping
someone here might know of something similar for the Shinsengumi. I
hope my constant questions aren't too obnoxious.

Thanks!
